description:
This add-on significantly increases the efficiency and comfort of using Thunderbird with NVDA.
For more information, visit :
https://www.rptools.org/NVDA-Thunderbird/get.php?pg=manual&v=g5&lang=en
For old releases, visit: 
https://www.rptools.org/ntbp/
